artist: Artist: Robert Mallet-Stevens; Publisher: Mourlot Freres, Paris
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: rectangular building with pumpkin accents; three tall windows left side and two on right side; short one level projections at corner and on right end; "BUREAU" above door; elaborate light fixture hanging by chains from scrolled brackets right side; names of pioneers in electricity around top edge of building; "USINE ELECTRIQUE" vertically below light on facade
portfolio: From Une Cite Moderne, Dessins de Rob Mallet-Stevens Architecte, Pub.  Murlot, Paris 1987
signed: in plate UL corner, in black: [R. M-S.]; below image in margin, in black: [USINE ÉLECTRIQUE]
title: Usine électrique, from "Une Cite Moderne, Dessins de Rob Mallet-Stevens Architecte"
